docs.lead_paragraph: IT is not the physical necessities that the neediest lack. Food, shelter, clothing--these are all available through public welfare. Their greatest need, rather, is for the help of a true friend, for steadying counsel when grief has numbed the mind, for practical guidance in the hurrying, bewildering city.

headline.main: REMEMBER THESE: THE CITY'S NEEDIEST; Your Gift of Friendship Will Renew Their Spirit
